Release Name:
The.Elder.Scrolls.V.Skyrim.Legendary.Edition

Official DLCs included (all optional):
Dawnguard
Hearthfire

High Resolution Texture Pack
This repack is lossless,nothing is ripped.....
You can access the high resolution texture pack and dlc's through the DATA FILES option which is present in the menu, when you launch skyrim launcher.exe...
Tick the corresponding add on's checkbox....

*If for some reason,you are unable to access the DATA FILES option,follow these steps:
Go to My Documents/My Games/Skyrim and open a file with the name SkyrimPrefs.ini...
It'll open using notepad,scroll down at the end and look for the lines:

[Launcher]
bShowAllResolutions=1
uLastAspectRatio=3

Add a line and modify it like this:

[Launcher]
bEnableFileSelection=1
bShowAllResolutions=1
uLastAspectRatio=3

Now you should be able to access the DATA FILES through skyrim launcher....

ENJOY AND SEED.............
